subject: Labor
lead_paragraph: Tennessee Titans center Kevin Mawae was elected president of the N.F.L. Players Association as the union braces for a potential labor fight. Mawae, 37, replaces Troy Vincent, the union’s president since 2004.
snippet: Tennessee Titans center Kevin Mawae was elected president of the N.F.L. Players Association as the union braces for a potential labor fight. Mawae, 37, replaces Troy Vincent, the union’s president since 2004.
